name: Fixies Cake Bakery Story! Decorating Baking Games
name_original: Fixies Cake Bakery Story! Decorating Baking Games
description:
Citizens of Fixie Town want cakes! Rule the chocolate factory and bake cakes for everyone!
Entertaining activities are promised to kids of all ages!
Funny characters The Fixies opened a cake bakery and are looking for a baker!
Responsibilities:
- Mix dough and bake cakes of most unusual shapes! (do you want a car or maybe a heart?)
- Choose delicious fillers (strawberry or banana?)
- Decorate cakes with colorful glaze, candy and lollipops!
- Take photos of all your masterpieces and share with everybody!

Characters will help players throughout the game, so even the youngest ones will be able to play without parents.
Colorful interface, funny characters and lots of candy are waiting for you!
